title: Speakers – The Festival of Consciousness

text:
Terapeuta Energética y formadora. Coordinadora y asistente personal Janosh España y Latino América en Janosh Energy Lab
🗨 Charla: "Activaciones con Geometría Sagrada y Frecuencias sanadoras de sonido. "

Speakers
Speakers
Sarah Florance
Yoga teacher. Guide from the feeling.
David Victori
Film director.
Luján Comas
President of the Icloby Foundation. Director of the project on awareness in cardiac arrests in the most reputable Spanish-speaking hospitals.
Rai Crespí
Anthropologist and psychotherapist CEO EntreHomes.
Inma Nogués
Specialist in Family Medicine. She graduated in Medicine and Surgery, Master in Naturopathic Medicine and Diploma in Homeopathy.
David S. Kong
Director, Community Biotechnology Initiative, MIT Media Lab.
.
Verónica Devenin
PhD Environmental Sciences and Technologies; Assistant Professor EADA Business School; Member of the Board B Academics.
Susana Dakini
Founder of Metta School. Awakening the Kundalini energy to return to the heart “Healing is touching with love what was previously touched by fear”.
Daniel Hires
Director Partnerships at Inner Development Goals.
Rodrigo Sala
Expert in Human Design and Team Configuration.
Marta Arteaga
Personalized Public Speaking Mentor, teambuilding and creativity trainer, writer and radio and TV presenter.
Carla Forns
Dancer. Transformation through movement.
José Luis ‘Uli’ Escorihuela
I+D director at Fabrika, High Performance Center for Cultural Transition.
May Carro
Bachelor of Fine Arts, uses art to awaken consciousness.
Luís Gallardo
Founder and president of World Happiness Foundation and World Happiness Fest.
Eric Imbernon
Founder & Coach at Movement Spirit.
Katarina Baliova
Healer and well-being coach.
Marianella Castillo
Founder of Caraibi and active meditation facilitator
Lucía Langa
Transformational Leadership at EADA and specialized in executive coaching.

CEO of Uriach, speaker and leadership expert.

Live poet and performer.

CEO of Economía Humana.

Expert in self-knowledge and meditation.

Architect, Geomancer, Earth Consciousness Researcher.

Profesor de Yoga 500h RYT.
Cleo Barnett
Directora de Amplifier Studios.
Sergi Rufi
PhD in Psychology, therapist and author of: “Una Psicología Real, El Arte de Ser Auténtico y Manual de Espiritualidad Rebelde”.
Adriana Bertran
Live poet, voice artist & content writer.
Louise Kay
Lecturer and teacher of spirituality.
Leo Rastogi
Founder of Consciousness Mentoring Institute.
Tony Estruch
Author and creator of Geniotipo.

Designer at King, Youtuber and communicator.
The Breath Act
Conscious Breathing School.
.
Brian Alt
Balt Sessions Founder.
Patricia Perreau
Animal Communicator. Animal therapies.

CEO & Founder of ayam and Co-Founder of Soulspring.
.

Promoter of Maternalmente, mindfulness for a conscious pregnancy and breeding.

Instructor of the Wim Hof Method, combining cold exposure with breathing and meditation techniques.
Andrés Martín
PhD Psychology. Author of the Best Seller “Plena mente”.
Paz Calap
Mental health, mindfulness and fulfillment coach.

Lakshmi Pratury
Founder and CEO of INK, entrepreneur, healer y speaker.
.

Astiko

Psychologist, writer and speaker.

Speaker, writer and new consciousness promoter.

Terapeuta Energética y formadora. Coordinadora y asistente personal Janosh España y Latino América en Janosh Energy Lab
🗨 Charla: "Activaciones con Geometría Sagrada y Frecuencias sanadoras de sonido. "
Visiting Scholar, PMH, CSTMS, University of California, Berkeley.
🗨 Talk: "Understanding consciousness: medical, ethical, legal and social implications"
Auditorium. July 16th, 13:30h
Músico y artista audivisual.
🎼 Actuación: “Concierto Balt Session”
Music & Food Zone. 16 july 9pm.
Diseñador en King, Youtuber y divulgador.
🗨Talk: “A qué juegan nuestros hijos” Agora Dome. 16 July, 10:45h.
Autor del libro "La Sabiduría del No Saber". Doctor en Ciencias Políticas y Sociología. Ha sido consultor, profesor y empresario. Su búsqueda de sentido le llevó a ordenarse monje Zen.
📖 Presentación libro: “La Sabiduría del no saber”
Book Lab. 16 July, 12h.
Movimiento creado por Pia Aravena y Zoraida Domènech, apasionadas astrólogas y formadoras. Sumérgete en la astrología de manera práctica y fascinante. Conéctate con la sabiduría ancestral desde el cuerpo y descubre el universo que eres.
💙 Workshop: “Venus y Marte en cuerpo y alma”
Body Lab. 16 July, 17:30h.
Maestra en Tantra, Amor y Presencia.
💙 Workshop "Consciencia encarnada"
Awaken Area. July 16th at 5:45pm.
Arpista eléctrica y cantante gaditana con un estilo genuino influenciado por el pop, el folk y la música electrónica.
🎼Act: “Balt Session”
Music & Food Zone. 15 July, 8:30pm.
Comunicadora. Guía del mundo invisible. Creadora de Casa Rosa China y Tribu Barcelona.
🤍 Ceremony: “Rito del útero”
Body Lab. July 15th, at 1pm
Creadora de espacios para la consciencia desde la palabra. Poeta, mentora de autores, editora y autora. Facilitadora de respiración consciente y CNV.
💙 Workshop: “Recordis. Volverte a pasar por mi corazón.”
Art Lab. July 16th at 5:45pm
Periodista, escritora, creadora del Método ToBloom: La intuición como brújula. Ha coescrito, junto con Aliciah, el libro La Sanación Silenciosa, editado por Kairós.
📖 Book presentation: “Encuentro entre ciencia y espiritualidad.”
Book Lab. July 16th at 12h.
CEO&Emotional Trainer en BeOm.
⏸Sesión meditativa: "Minimalismo Emocional: Del Hacer al Ser, con el Método BeOm"
Body Lab. July 16th at 4pm
Guía espiritual y facilitadora de ceremonias.
🤍 Ceremonia de Tabaco y Cacao
The Cave. July 15th at 16h.
Art & Consciousness.
💙 Workshop: “Arte, creatividad y consciencia.”
Art Lab. July 16th at 11:30h. and at 18:30h.
Chef terapéutica, ecochef e investigadora para la industria.
📖 Book presentation: “Reto Serenity 9 días: pequeños pasos, grandes transformaciones”
Book Lab. July 16th, at 4pm
